result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph A Faris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joseph A Faris is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joseph A Faris was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Joseph A Faris was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Joseph A Faris was found guilty of Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Dane County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Each ct concur. No obj to early term of prob after 18 mo if def has complied with all cond of prob w/ no new charges to level of probable cause.

miscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
$200 DNA surcharge remitted. $253  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.
Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with JR.

Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample-prev provided per DCSO.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

supervisions.notes: IMPOSED & STAYED. With huber. Concur to ct 1.

miscConds.notes: Court costs remitted. $67 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.

supervisions.notes: IMPOSED & STAYED. With huber. Concur to ct 1.

miscConds.notes: Court costs remitted. $67 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.

SIGNATURE BOND SET - REFERRAL TO BMP
- The court orders a Signature Bond in the amount of $1,000.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his release from jail.
- Defendant must reside with mother, Jeanette J. at 620 W Badger Rd, Apt 9, Madison, WI  53713.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with John R.
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon.  
- Defendant shall not consume alcohol/absolute sobriety - Intoxilizer.

Add condition:  Defn shall live with mother, Jeanette J, 620 W Badger Rd, Apt 9, Madison WI  53713.  All other conditions remain the same.
